string.value: John Barricade has told me about the Ancient Artifacts I've found in my offline travels (playing the MapleStory Trading Card Game). He thinks that these can be used to construct powerful weapons and items. If I bring him a valid set of those I find, he'll be able to tell me what I can make and how to make them.
